author: elecharny
msg: Applied patch submitted by Norval in DIRSERVER-1257

author: rickhall
msg: Applied patch (FELIX-728) to fix an issue where requests to Start Level
and Package Admin threads were not being immediately released, which was

author: chirino
msg: - Checking the amount of disk space used is now much faster and accurate.
- removed ref counting of journal files since that was un-used.
- Fixed NPE that would occur in the BTree when the getFirst/getLast was used and tree depth was > 1
- We now checkpoint and clean up at two different intervals.  We now checkpoint a much higher rate so that recover is much faster.
- Made recovery error handling more robust.
